item.title: Web x.0 in Neuromancer
item.description: Web 3.0 There is a lot of buzz about Web 3.0 out there and Its not new. When people got used to the term Web 2.0, academics and experts had started publishing their articles on this extremely compelling subject. Marketing and sales teams were already polishing the term. The oldest article that I can find is from 2005 with the title “What to expect from Web 3.0". If I look at the year 2005, the world was different.
